org.propelgraph.util

Class CreateGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.propelgraph.util.CreateGraph

  • public class CreateGraph
extends Object
    This class provides helper methods that simplify creation and opening of graphs while still supporting the LocatableGraphFactory family of interfaces. 
     
 Graph g = CreateGraph.openGraph( CreateGraph.GRAPH_TINKERMEM,
    Author:
    ccjason (11/11/2014)

    • Method Detail

      • addAuthorInfo

        public static void addAuthorInfo(Graph g)
        adds vertices and edges related to Shakespeare. If the graph was empty, the resulting small graph is suitable for some simple demos.
        Parameters:
        g -

      • openGraph

        public static Graph openGraph(String graphtype,
              String graphname)
                       throws IOException,
                              InterruptedException,
                              InstantiationException,
                              IllegalAccessException,
                              ClassNotFoundException,
                              AlreadyExistsException,
                              NotFoundException,
                              UnsupportedFActionException
        a simpler version of the openGraph(String,String,Map) method. This method is more suitable for use in the Gremlin console.

        graphname -
